nodes.text: Gwanda gourds could be found growing on Endor. The gourds varied in shades of blue, pink, and purple and had a lumpy, bumpy texture. Gwanda gourds, according to the Ewoks, made the best rattles for the great Wistie Dance at the Festival of the Wisties.
In preparation for one particular festival, Princess Kneesaa retrieved a gourd for the shaman Logray.
